page.title: 17ENTERTAINMENT, GRAINTHORPE
page.content: The performing arts are normally limited to varied plays,pantomimes, singing,dancing and musical soirees, produced at various times of the year by both the Primary School and the Chapel Sunday School. Whist Drives and Bingo sessions for worthy causes,eg. The Blind or a local organisation needing to raise funds to buy some equipment,take place at regular intervals in the Village Hall. The Church also presents special services,visiting singers and orchestras during the year. The Toc H,lorry born and with an organ,tour the village rendering Carols during the Christmas festivities.
